actions.name: BatchDetectDominantLanguage
actions.description: Grants permission to detect the language or languages present in the list of text documents

actions.name: BatchDetectEntities
actions.description: Grants permission to detect the named entities ("People", "Places", "Locations", etc) within the given list of text documents

actions.name: BatchDetectKeyPhrases
actions.description: Grants permission to detect the phrases in the list of text documents that are most indicative of the content

actions.name: BatchDetectSentiment
actions.description: Grants permission to detect the sentiment of a text in the list of documents (Positive, Negative, Neutral, or Mixed)

actions.name: BatchDetectSyntax
actions.description: Grants permission to detect syntactic information (like Part of Speech, Tokens) in a list of text documents

actions.name: BatchDetectTargetedSentiment
actions.description: Grants permission to detect the sentiments associated with specific entities (such as brands or products) within the given list of text documents

actions.name: ClassifyDocument
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new document classification request to analyze a single document in real-time, using a previously created and trained custom model and an endpoint

actions.name: ContainsPiiEntities
actions.description: Grants permission to classify the personally identifiable information within given documents in real-time

actions.name: CreateDataset
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new dataset within a flywheel

actions.name: CreateDocumentClassifier
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new document classifier that you can use to categorize documents

actions.name: CreateEndpoint
actions.description: Grants permission to create a model-specific endpoint for synchronous inference for a previously trained custom model

actions.name: CreateEntityRecognizer
actions.description: Grants permission to create an entity recognizer using submitted files

actions.name: CreateFlywheel
actions.description: Grants permission to create a new flywheel that you can use to train model versions

actions.name: DeleteDocumentClassifier
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a previously created document classifier

actions.name: DeleteEndpoint
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a model-specific endpoint for a previously-trained custom model. All endpoints must be deleted in order for the model to be deleted

actions.name: DeleteEntityRecognizer
actions.description: Grants permission to delete a submitted entity recognizer

actions.name: DeleteFlywheel
actions.description: Grants permission to Delete a flywheel

actions.name: DeleteResourcePolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to remove policy on resource

actions.name: DescribeDataset
actions.description: Grants permission to get the properties associated with a dataset

actions.name: DescribeDocumentClassificationJob
actions.description: Grants permission to get the properties associated with a document classification job

actions.name: DescribeDocumentClassifier
actions.description: Grants permission to get the properties associated with a document classifier

actions.name: DescribeDominantLanguageDetectionJob
actions.description: Grants permission to get the properties associated with a dominant language detection job

actions.name: DescribeEndpoint
actions.description: Grants permission to get the properties associated with a specific endpoint. Use this operation to get the status of an endpoint

actions.name: DescribeEntitiesDetectionJob
actions.description: Grants permission to get the properties associated with an entities detection job

actions.name: DescribeEntityRecognizer
actions.description: Grants permission to provide details about an entity recognizer including status, S3 buckets containing training data, recognizer metadata, metrics, and so on

actions.name: DescribeEventsDetectionJob
actions.description: Grants permission to get the properties associated with an Events detection job

actions.name: DescribeFlywheel
actions.description: Grants permission to get the properties associated with a flywheel

actions.name: DescribeFlywheelIteration
actions.description: Grants permission to get the properties associated with a flywheel iteration for a flywheel

actions.name: DescribeKeyPhrasesDetectionJob
actions.description: Grants permission to get the properties associated with a key phrases detection job

actions.name: DescribePiiEntitiesDetectionJob
actions.description: Grants permission to get the properties associated with a PII entities detection job

actions.name: DescribeResourcePolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to read attached policy on resource

actions.name: DescribeSentimentDetectionJob
actions.description: Grants permission to get the properties associated with a sentiment detection job

actions.name: DescribeTargetedSentimentDetectionJob
actions.description: Grants permission to get the properties associated with a targeted sentiment detection job

actions.name: DescribeTopicsDetectionJob
actions.description: Grants permission to get the properties associated with a topic detection job

actions.name: DetectDominantLanguage
actions.description: Grants permission to detect the language or languages present in the text

actions.name: DetectEntities
actions.description: Grants permission to detect the named entities ("People", "Places", "Locations", etc) within the given text document

actions.name: DetectKeyPhrases
actions.description: Grants permission to detect the phrases in the text that are most indicative of the content

actions.name: DetectPiiEntities
actions.description: Grants permission to detect the personally identifiable information entities ("Name", "SSN", "PIN", etc) within the given text document

actions.name: DetectSentiment
actions.description: Grants permission to detect the sentiment of a text in a document (Positive, Negative, Neutral, or Mixed)

actions.name: DetectSyntax
actions.description: Grants permission to detect syntactic information (like Part of Speech, Tokens) in a text document

actions.name: DetectTargetedSentiment
actions.description: Grants permission to detect the sentiments associated with specific entities (such as brands or products) in a document

actions.name: DetectToxicContent
actions.description: Grants permission to detect toxic content within the given list of text segments

actions.name: ImportModel
actions.description: Grants permission to import a trained Comprehend model

actions.name: ListDatasets
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of the Datasets associated with a flywheel

actions.name: ListDocumentClassificationJobs
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of the document classification jobs that you have submitted

actions.name: ListDocumentClassifierSummaries
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of summaries of the document classifiers that you have created

actions.name: ListDocumentClassifiers
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of the document classifiers that you have created

actions.name: ListDominantLanguageDetectionJobs
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of the dominant language detection jobs that you have submitted

actions.name: ListEndpoints
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of all existing endpoints that you've created

actions.name: ListEntitiesDetectionJobs
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of the entity detection jobs that you have submitted

actions.name: ListEntityRecognizerSummaries
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of summaries for the entity recognizers that you have created

actions.name: ListEntityRecognizers
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of the properties of all entity recognizers that you created, including recognizers currently in training

actions.name: ListEventsDetectionJobs
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of Events detection jobs that you have submitted

actions.name: ListFlywheelIterationHistory
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of iterations associated for a flywheel

actions.name: ListFlywheels
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of the flywheels that you have created

actions.name: ListKeyPhrasesDetectionJobs
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of key phrase detection jobs that you have submitted

actions.name: ListPiiEntitiesDetectionJobs
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of PII entities detection jobs that you have submitted

actions.name: ListSentimentDetectionJobs
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of sentiment detection jobs that you have submitted

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list tags for a resource

actions.name: ListTargetedSentimentDetectionJobs
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of targeted sentiment detection jobs that you have submitted

actions.name: ListTopicsDetectionJobs
actions.description: Grants permission to get a list of the topic detection jobs that you have submitted

actions.name: PutResourcePolicy
actions.description: Grants permission to attach policy to resource

actions.name: StartDocumentClassificationJob
actions.description: Grants permission to start an asynchronous document classification job

actions.name: StartDominantLanguageDetectionJob
actions.description: Grants permission to start an asynchronous dominant language detection job for a collection of documents

actions.name: StartEntitiesDetectionJob
actions.description: Grants permission to start an asynchronous entity detection job for a collection of documents

actions.name: StartEventsDetectionJob
actions.description: Grants permission to start an asynchronous Events detection job for a collection of documents

actions.name: StartFlywheelIteration
actions.description: Grants permission to start a flywheel iteration for a flywheel

actions.name: StartKeyPhrasesDetectionJob
actions.description: Grants permission to start an asynchronous key phrase detection job for a collection of documents

actions.name: StartPiiEntitiesDetectionJob
actions.description: Grants permission to start an asynchronous PII entities detection job for a collection of documents

actions.name: StartSentimentDetectionJob
actions.description: Grants permission to start an asynchronous sentiment detection job for a collection of documents

actions.name: StartTargetedSentimentDetectionJob
actions.description: Grants permission to start an asynchronous targeted sentiment detection job for a collection of documents

actions.name: StartTopicsDetectionJob
actions.description: Grants permission to start an asynchronous job to detect the most common topics in the collection of documents and the phrases associated with each topic

actions.name: StopDominantLanguageDetectionJob
actions.description: Grants permission to stop a dominant language detection job

actions.name: StopEntitiesDetectionJob
actions.description: Grants permission to stop an entity detection job

actions.name: StopEventsDetectionJob
actions.description: Grants permission to stop an Events detection job

actions.name: StopKeyPhrasesDetectionJob
actions.description: Grants permission to stop a key phrase detection job

actions.name: StopPiiEntitiesDetectionJob
actions.description: Grants permission to stop a PII entities detection job

actions.name: StopSentimentDetectionJob
actions.description: Grants permission to stop a sentiment detection job

actions.name: StopTargetedSentimentDetectionJob
actions.description: Grants permission to stop a targeted sentiment detection job

actions.name: StopTrainingDocumentClassifier
actions.description: Grants permission to stop a previously created document classifier training job

actions.name: StopTrainingEntityRecognizer
actions.description: Grants permission to stop a previously created entity recognizer training job

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to tag a resource with given key value pairs

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to untag a resource with given key

actions.name: UpdateEndpoint
actions.description: Grants permission to update information about the specified endpoint

actions.name: UpdateFlywheel
actions.description: Grants permission to Update a flywheel's configuration
